author: Staff Reporter
text:
Residents of Ambur Municipality have got a new government health facility.

The Directorate of Public Health and Preventive Medicine has established an urban health centre at B. Kaspa area of the municipality.

Sangeetha Balasubramani, chairperson of the municipality, inaugurated the urban health centre on Friday.

She said residents of the area have been seeking such a medical facility for the last four years.

At least 40,000 residents in the surrounding area will benefit from this health centre.
title: Urban health centre opened
